<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CHDk2YwJP5M?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">15</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; O God, Thou art transcendent&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0015.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/p2Ag9qQQkcg?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">16</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Our Father, as the <a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0016.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">evergreen</a>&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0016.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5sDykrx5pck?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">30</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; What love Thou has bestowed on <a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0030.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">us&nbsp;</a></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0030.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[Lyrics]</span></span></span></span></a></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/uuByezgkK9s?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">31</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; All that we were- our sins (Alt tune: 177)<a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0030.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</a></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/31" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[Lyrics]</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IwHHo7CaHYI?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">32</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; We bow and worship, Father <a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0032.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">here&nbsp;</a></span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0032.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[Lyrics]</a></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/R_R-fBwE2Ks?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">33</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Father, long before creation&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/33" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nkPus4Hab6U?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">34</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Father, 'twas Thy love that knew us&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/34" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3tfIuze8HYU?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">36</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; We praise Thee glorious Father&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/36" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/q8HHcYEjzHg?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">45</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Abba, Father! we adore Thee&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/45" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iWCEwGy6rxE?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">48</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; We bless Thee, God and Father&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/48" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/j6g0fBatmDw" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">48</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; We bless Thee, God and (Alt tune: 36)&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/48" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xnagiYaDJoA?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">49</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Gracious God, we worship Thee&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/49" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/naLmFY6z5Mo?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">50</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Father, Thy Son beloved leads our praise&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/50" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/attSmm9cCuA?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">51</span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Our God and Father, we respond to Thee </span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/51" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span></span></span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Azb1JwXD9Us?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">51</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Our God and Father, we respond (Alt tune: 52) </span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/51" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Azb1JwXD9Us?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">52</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Father, to Thee a joyful song (As written)&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/52" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/MtgNbR65hLg?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">52</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Father, to Thee a joyful song (With holds)&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/52" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/acn7dXLvo4E?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">53</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Our God and Father, we respond anew </span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/53" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kZPo2UlsARY?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">53</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Our God and Father, we (Alt tune: 50)&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/53" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dBUSi1hmK-k?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">54</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; O God and Father, we our praises bring </span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/54" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zQlWPObvu-E?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">54</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; O God and Father, we our (Alt tune: 50)&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/54" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YOVJNU-uuD8?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">55</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; O God our Father, we would come&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/55" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/etSnE8Z2tbs?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">57</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; The image of the Father God&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0057.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span></span></p></div><div id="comp-kxawtpy0" class="HcOXKn c9GqVL QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-kxawtpy0 wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span>Praise of the Lord</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px; line-height:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HDv5yHva6yI?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">5</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">9</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Thou art the everlasting Word&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span></span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/59" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px; line-height:normal;"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2VODX17QjPU?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">60</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Of the Father's love begotten&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/60" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xoWDozNAOJA?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">61</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; O Lord, Thou art the Son of man&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0061.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span></span></span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4STg3TRCCzM?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">62</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Dear Lord Jesus, we adore Thee&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0062.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/p_hSm7KxPWc?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">65</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Jesus! that name we love&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/65" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7T9YPNi7L8c?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">66</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; How sweet the name of Jesus sounds&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/66" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ct-gYKozKSg?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">67</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; The name of Jesus is so sweet&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/67" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Nkqhe6qf1p0?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">82</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Down from His glory&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/82" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jzVRuKZ1Pd0?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">84</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Hark! the herald angels sing&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/84" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/N_wurpEB3rs?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">85</a></span> &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; O come, all ye faithful&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/85" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ih5xnNBiOfY?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">86</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Though Thou art God, most glorious high&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0086.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4P0AnLChAts?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">87</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; O Lord! When we the path retrace&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/87" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yuSD82xdTc4?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">88</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; How beauteous were the marks divine&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/88" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1DbZ2wtn-9s?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">113</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; How pleasant is the sound of praise!&nbsp;</span><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/113" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></span></a><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ScpW9ZhXiMs?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">133</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Lord Jesus, Thou art Lord (Alt tune:137)&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0133.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TtBplJZkKIw?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">151</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Sing we the King who is coming to reign&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/151" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9fBdIPobF64?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">152</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; O how deep and how (Original)&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0152.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7xEaRjdd8GU?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">168</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Now in a song of grateful praise&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/168" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3tDn_MAOHE4?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">186</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Glory be to Him who loved us&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/186" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/MKu0nB4Ui2E?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">189</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Thou art the Son beloved&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0189.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CuaocokrAJY?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">204</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Gathered in Thy name (Original)&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/204" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/x2YCNOBmIfQ?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">220</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; When on Thy table, Lord, we gaze&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0220.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal; font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/20_21VR3OKg?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">242</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; The Spirit of God today&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0242.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span>Assurance and Joy of Salvation</p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span </span></span></span></span></span><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span <p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CtXvVc8NWPI?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">816</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; God’s own Word must not be taken<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0816.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gU6bcpVEnVI?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">816</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; God’s own Word must not be (Alt tune: 538)<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0816.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span></span></span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span>The Church</span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tWAVOCw2aWA?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">852</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Thy dwelling place, O Lord I love<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0852.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xtdhXFBcBCw?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">853</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; I love Thy kingdom, Lord<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/853" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span>Service</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,futura-lt-w05-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RtbWLP1UDrk?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">896</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Go labor on; spend, and be spent</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/896" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span>The Kingdom</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; God’s kingdom is God’s reigning</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" <p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/62M3ZihMrYI?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">966</span></a></span><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; O hope of glory, our Christ will return</span><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0966.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></span></p></div><div id="comp-k9a7shki" class="Vd6aQZ ignore-focus comp-k9a7shki" tabindex="-1" role="region" aria-label="Hymns 1000-1200"><div id="hymns10001200"></div><span class="mHZSwn">Hymns 1000-1200</span></div><div id="comp-kv8cxhvt" class="HcOXKn c9GqVL QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-kv8cxhvt wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span>Ultimate Manifestation</span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Bws8FuhT29Y?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">979</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; How glorious, how bright it shines<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0979.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>
