<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Yu5-2ygTZo0?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">981</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; In His Christ to head up all things<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0981.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/s4JP9VNM-2w?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">984</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Rivers of living water<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H0984.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span>Gospel</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:1.2em; font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dcvFG1Y52N0?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">986</a></span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Christ has a full redemption made</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/986" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:1.2em; font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7tJSb5oGWD4?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1003</a></span>&nbsp; Why should I worry, doubt and fear?</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1003" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2D1E3gPh5ZI?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1025</a></span>&nbsp; Give up the world, Christ to obtain<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H1025.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/D-QujIGKhmA?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1027</a></span>&nbsp; Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1027" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hHr486hcAqs?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1074</a></span>&nbsp; O what a mystery, the Savior<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="http://www.witness-lee-hymns.org/hymns/H1074.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XzdcXOc29es?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1077</a></span>&nbsp; There were ninety and nine<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1077" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xjvbAD7YpXA?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1095</a></span>&nbsp; The Lord shall get the glory<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1095" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2oKFXuQlJ1I?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1111</a></span>&nbsp; Gathered at Thy table Lord<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1111" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SHxacrAM25A?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1112</a></span>&nbsp; Oh, how glorious is Thy table Lord<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1112" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></span></p></div><div id="comp-k9a814gk" class="Vd6aQZ ignore-focus comp-k9a814gk" tabindex="-1" role="region" aria-label="Hymns 1200-1348, Extras"><div id="hymns12001348extras"></div><span class="mHZSwn">Hymns 1200-1348, Extras</span></div><div id="comp-kv875sxo" class="HcOXKn c9GqVL QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-kv875sxo wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="color:#58758c;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span><span style="color:#58758c;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Fullness of the Spirit</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span>Spiritual Warfare</p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,futura-lt-w05-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ESk4CtQycVg?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1282</a></span>&nbsp; <p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></p></div><div id="comp-kab2m4zm" class="Vd6aQZ ignore-focus comp-kab2m4zm" tabindex="-1" role="region" aria-label="Playlists"><div id="playlists"></div><span class="mHZSwn">Playlists</span></div><section id="comp-ir243ra8" class="comp-ir243ra8 CohWsy wixui-column-strip"><div id="bgLayers_comp-ir243ra8" data-hook="bgLayers" data-motion-part="BG_LAYER comp-ir243ra8" class="if7Vw2"><div data-testid="colorUnderlay" class="tcElKx i1tH8h"></div><div id="bgMedia_comp-ir243ra8" data-motion-part="BG_MEDIA comp-ir243ra8" class="wG8dni"></div></div><div data-testid="columns" class="V5AUxf"><div id="mediairaosuq21" class="mediairaosuq21 YzqVVZ wixui-column-strip__column"><div id="bgLayers_mediairaosuq21" data-hook="bgLayers" data-motion-part="BG_LAYER mediairaosuq21" class="MW5IWV"><div data-testid="colorUnderlay" class="LWbAav Kv1aVt"></div><div id="bgMedia_mediairaosuq21" data-motion-part="BG_MEDIA mediairaosuq21" class="VgO9Yg"></div></div><div data-mesh-id="mediairaosuq21inlineContent" data-testid="inline-content" class=""><div data-mesh-id="mediairaosuq21inlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><div id="comp-ir243raj" class="HcOXKn SxM0TO QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-ir243raj wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:30px;"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">About Piano Hymns</span></h6></div><div id="comp-ir243rad" class="HcOXKn SxM0TO QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-ir243rad wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">This site provides commonly-sung hymns from our hymnal&nbsp;that have been recorded as&nbsp;piano accompaniment for live singing in our virtual church meetings.&nbsp;Most hymns have been transposed into lower keys for more comfortable singing.&nbsp; Each video includes an introduction and all the stanzas of the hymn once through.&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif; font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">This is an ongoing project and hymns will continually be added.</span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Those using desktop/laptop devices may&nbsp;search for hymns&nbsp;on this site by pressing Control+F (Command+F on Macs) and using&nbsp;the search field that pops up at the top right of the page.</span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">These videos can also be used as a reference for those who are learning to play the piano in the church meetings.&nbsp; </span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">All the videos on this&nbsp;webpage may also be accessed directly via the <span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9xyzY-BVGn_ys7s4tE36mQ/playlists" target="_blank" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Piano Hymns YouTube channel</a></span>, where songs have been grouped into playlists for easy accessibility.</span></span></p></div><div id="comp-k9njriay" class="HcOXKn SxM0TO QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-k9njriay wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:30px;"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#0E4875;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">How to Use Piano Hymns</span></span></h6></div><div id="comp-k9zxzt0r" class="HcOXKn SxM0TO QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-k9zxzt0r wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span>​</p>

<ol class="font_8 color_11 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">Before streaming, update Zoom to the latest version.&nbsp; (From the Zoom menu: "zoom.us"&nbsp;&gt; "Check for latest updates…")Adjust settings according to <span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://d6524421-484e-4e09-8278-5c4d8a37272d.filesusr.com/ugd/aff94b_56cf25a76e5c42c79d8ef5827c4203fb.pdf" target="_blank" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">these guidelines</span></a></span>.</span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">Ethernet provides a clearer sound than Wifi. If an ethernet cable is unavailable, positioning the PC near the router also helps.&nbsp;</span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">If streaming with singing accompaniment, external mics or wired headsets improve the quality of sound.</span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">When streaming, remember to mute all other participants.</span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">It is strongly recommended that those conducting the streaming do a dry run with a few other saints in order to resolve any issues and ensure optimal settings/positions of devices, etc. before the meeting.</span></p>
</li>
</ol>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">The options given below outline how to stream Piano Hymns music WITH singing accompaniment. To stream WITHOUT singing accompaniment, simply use Option 2 and make sure that all participants (including the streamer) are on mute.</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">Option 1 (RECOMMENDED): One participant plays Piano Hymns on a second device&nbsp;while singing along:</span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">Audio can simply be streamed from a second device (such as a phone or iPad) held close to the microphone of the PC of the designated singer(s).&nbsp;This option eliminates lag between singing and music, and does not require as much bandwidth as Option 2.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">Option 2: One&nbsp;participant&nbsp;plays Piano Hymns via PC&nbsp;while singing along:</span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">Select “Share screen” &gt; “Share computer sound” &gt; Select Piano Hymns website.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">To stream audio only (no video), select “Share screen” &gt; “Advanced” tab &gt; “Music or Computer Sound Only.”</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">Ensure that the PC of the person streaming/singing is not muted.</span></p></div><div id="comp-k9njs9k6" class="HcOXKn SxM0TO QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-k9njs9k6 wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:30px;"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#0E4875;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Modifying Tempo</span></span></h6></div><div id="comp-k9zxws1d" class="HcOXKn SxM0TO QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-k9zxws1d wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://playpianohymns.wixsite.com/index" target="_self" data-anchor-comp-id="comp-ir243raz" data-anchor="dataItem-ir243raz1" class="wixui-rich-text__text">To modify the tempo of a song during playback, music speed can be adjusted in YouTube via Settings</a>:</span></span>​</p></div><div id="comp-ka1q9j0h" class="HcOXKn SxM0TO QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-ka1q9j0h wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><ol class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif; font-size:16px;">
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Press <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">play</span>&nbsp;to begin playback of the video</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Click on the small <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">cog icon</span>&nbsp;that appears in the lower left corner of the YouTube window (Settings)</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Select <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">"Playback Speed"</span></span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Select a <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">preset speed adjustment</span>, or select <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">"Custom"</span> (upper right corner) to make a more specific adjustment.</span></span></p>
</li>
</ol></div><div id="comp-k9zz57iv" class="HcOXKn SxM0TO QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-k9zz57iv wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:30px;"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#0E4875;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Submit a Request for a Hymn to be Recorded</span></span></h6></div><div id="comp-k8a9mt2e" class="bkIuWA comp-k8a9mt2e"><div data-mesh-id="comp-k8a9mt2einlineContent" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:10px;"><span style="font-size:10px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">These piano hymn accompaniments are provided as a voluntary service to help localities who may not have access to musical accompaniment, particularly for remote meetings. The hymns are from <span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Hymns</span>, ©1966 Living Stream Ministry; however, these accompaniments are not from or endorsed by&nbsp;Living Stream Ministry.&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size:10px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">These recordings are for local use only and are not intended for mass distribution.</span></span></span></p></div><div id="comp-l01yww2q" class="HcOXKn c9GqVL QxJLC3 lq2cno YQcXTT comp-l01yww2q wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement" ariaattributes="[object Object]"><p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="color:#58758c;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span><span style="color:#58758c;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Ultimate Manifestation</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/f9gO79_EEe4?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1324</a></span>&nbsp; Our God is a God of purpose<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[<span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1324" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</a></span>]</span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fO8sdpi8WHY?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1325</a></span>&nbsp; God eternal has a purpose<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1325" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="color:#58758c;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:14px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span><span style="color:#58758c;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:georgia,palatino,book antiqua,palatino linotype,serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-size:16px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Gospel</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:14px;"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qnoxoNqKp6I?rel=0" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text">1326</a></span> &nbsp;What is living all about<span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#000000;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">[</span></span></span><a href="https://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1326" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="text-decoration:underline;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Lyrics</span></span></span></span></a><span style="font-family:futura-lt-w01-book,sans-serif;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_14 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:italic;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">]</span></span></span></p>
